an inaugural speech is the first given by someone who is starting an important job
the inaugural lecture of the new Professor of American Literature
an inaugural event is the first in a planned series of similar events
the inaugural match of Major League Soccer
the first in a series of meetings, flights etc
The problem was detected on the plane’s inaugural flight.
a speech, lecture etc given by a person who has taken up an important position, to introduce themselves and their ideas
In hisinaugural address, the president called attention to the needs of the homeless.
